hero.title: Support local makers
hero.subtitle: Unique, handcrafted goods from talented local artisans. Every purchase supports independent makers and tells a story. From pottery to jewelry to home decor - discover one-of-a-kind treasures. Shop online or visit our collective.

about.title: Supporting Local Makers
about.subtitle: Handmade with heart
about.content: Maker's Market brings together the best local artisans under one roof. Each maker is carefully selected for their craftsmanship, creativity, and commitment to quality. When you shop with us, you're supporting real people pursuing their passion.

products.name: Hand-Carved Wooden Bowl
products.description: Beautiful bowl hand-carved from local hardwood. Each one unique. Finished with food-safe oil. By artisan Tom Chen.

products.name: Sterling Silver Pendant Necklace
products.description: Handcrafted sterling silver pendant. Modern minimalist design. By jewelry maker Sarah Martinez.

products.name: Hand-Poured Soy Candle Set
products.description: Set of 3 hand-poured soy candles in reusable containers. Seasonal scents. 40+ hour burn time. By Emma's Candles.

products.name: Handwoven Wall Hanging
products.description: Beautiful textile wall hanging, handwoven on a floor loom. Natural fibers. Statement piece. By Fiber Artist collective.

products.name: Handmade Ceramic Mug
products.description: Wheel-thrown ceramic mug by local potter. Unique glaze patterns. Microwave and dishwasher safe.

products.name: Leather Journal Cover
products.description: Hand-stitched leather journal cover. Fits standard notebooks. Develops beautiful patina. By Leather Works Studio.

items.text: Love finding unique gifts here! Everything is beautifully made and I feel good knowing I'm supporting local artists. The quality is incredible.
items.author: Jessica Taylor
items.title: Regular Shopper

items.text: Bought a wooden bowl and it's now my favorite kitchen piece. You can tell it was made with care. Planning to get more pieces as gifts!
items.author: David Kim
items.title: Happy Customer
